t: Amazon.com: Best of The Doobies: CDs & Vinyl
s: Best of The Doobies is the first greatest hits album by The Doobie Brothers. The album has material from Toulouse Street through Takin' It to the Streets, and is also a diamond record. The album was first released by Warner Bros. Records in November 1976 and is now back on vinyl.

t: The Doobie Brothers Vinyl Records — Dutch Vinyl Record Store
s: The Doobie Brothers are an American rock band formed in San Jose, California in 1970. The group is best known for their hits like "Listen to the Music," "Black Water," "Long Train Runnin'," "China Grove," and "Jesus Is Just Alright."
